text: The Volkswagen ID.6 is a future electric SUV produced by the German automobile manufacturer Volkswagen in China and marketed from 2022 for the local market then in Europe and the United States. It is based on the MEB platform, and part of the ID. Series. == I.D. Roomzz == The Volkswagen I.D. Roomzz was first presented at the Shanghai Motor Show in April 2019. The concept is a family SUV with sliding doors at the front and rear with opposite opening. It is based on MEB modular electric platform. The concept car is powered by two electric motors placed on the axles, with a power of at the front and at the rear for a power cumulative of , powered by a lithium-ion battery with a capacity of offering a maximum autonomy of . ==References== Category:Upcoming car models ID.6 Category:Crossover sport utility vehicles Category:Electric sport utility vehicles Category:Cars introduced in 2019 Category:2020s cars
title: Volkswagen ID.6
